metadata.title: CVE-2017-8363 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The flac_buffer_copy function in flac.c in libsndfile 1.0.28 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read andapplication crash) via a crafted audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8363` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.1').
